name.description: Name of the new duplicated Point. If not provided, the name will be the same as the original Point with a (copy) suffix appended.

duplicateDataStreamMappings.description: Boolean flag indicating if the original Point's Data Stream Mappings should be duplicated.

equipId.description: Unique identifier of the Equipment the duplicated Point will belong to. If not provided, the duplicated Point will belong to the same Equipment as the original Point.
